Literature.Title: Leishmanicidal activity of synthetic antimicrobial peptides in an infection model with human dendritic cells.
Literature.Author: Pérez-Cordero JJ, Lozano JM, Cortés J, Delgado G

Literature.Title: Antifungal activity in vitro and in vivo of a salmon protamine peptide and its derived cyclic peptide against Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Nagao JI, Cho T, Mitarai M, Iohara K, Hayama K, Abe S, Tanaka Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=69.89±0.08 µg/ml,Human dendritic cells:50% Cell death=22.28±0.37 µg/ml
